Whee... time to kill two birds with one stone. Dinobot wasn't using his 
energy weapons during coming of the fuzors instead he was using a hand 
blaster and a shotgun laser blaster type thing. Because of this he ran out of 
ammo. Also the weapons couldnt be solar charged because then they would have 
to be outraegeously used to charge and power the weapon. And if there were 
solar cells then there would have been power to power the weapons at night 
since what kind of idiot wouldn't have solar batteries that took in some of 
the energy to operate the weapon at night. This still doesn't explain why 
they faught at night either. Face it they needed ammo and they did run out of 
it at times and in G1 they also ran out. Don't deny simple facts such as 
these because you feel you can't RP without firing 40 shots in one post at an 
enemy.
